settings.title: Buckets of dahlias
settings.text: We offer buckets in both pastel and brighter shades, perfect for styling your own weddings, events, celebrations or for floral art.

settings.title: Boutique dahlia bouquets
settings.text: Available for pick up from our farm in the heart of Tasman, picked fresh and arranged in the evening before they are required.

settings.title: Flower Subscription
settings.text:
Beautiful mixed farmer choice dahlia bouquets delivered fresh to your door on Friday afternoons to enjoy over the weekend or to share with friends.

Purchase for yourself or for a gift that keeps giving.

settings.title: Farm flower shed
settings.text: We have Roadside flower shed that is stocked daily with simple freshly cut bunches of dahlias through the summer months, these sell out fast so to avoid disappointment ordering is always the safest option.

settings.title: Dahlia Tubers
settings.text: We offer dahlia tubers, ready to burst into stunning blooms. Plant these underground treasures and watch your garden come alive with vibrant colors.
